analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika sukha sahagata duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
